name: CHROMA DRIFT
description:
CHROMA DRIFT is a cute and frenzy shmup, throwback to the days when the ultimate goal was that precious highscore!

Fight against endless streams of enemies with your arsenal of 6 weapons, from the spread TRIPLE MACHINEGUN, to the deadly LIGHTNING LASER.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow keys: Move
Space/Z: Shoot
P: Pause the game
F10: Switch fullscreen

KUDOS TO...

Cluly - for making these hella cute sprites.
Monkopus - for that chunky Harmonic font.
DOS-88 - for the catchy synthwave track "Parabola".
